description: looks like ubuntu and is use ful for stuff

It's passable, bordering on the edge of "almost good enough". It feels incomplete, and it needs more extensive themes, but they aren't bad. Two stars, mostly because it's buggy - on Ubuntu Cinnamon 22.04 Testing at least. Accounting for my 22.04 test bugs, it's above one star at least. It needs a ton more work, and that's ignoring most bugs with me putting it as "it's the beta testing distro, not the project". Ignoring the bugs and getting two stars aint good.

Stage es el programa más maduro en el paquete Calligra y es sencillamente alucinante, desde su facilidad de uso, rendimiento y funcionalidad. Diferentes tipos de formato no varían a un nivel inaccesible, pero aún requiere mayor atención en este punto.
summary: Impresionante, el mejor logrado en Calligra

description: Como ninguna, más que excelente, genial!!
